post:
Hi guys! We have the following deals available for Black Friday and Cyber Monday. I'll make it short and sweet!

##Some rules:
- Offers are recurring.
- Offers are available until **2nd Dec** or **while stocks last**
- Discounts **do not** apply for upgrading to higher packages.
- There will be some small restocks everyday at 1 AM GMT +7.
- We only support WIndows server OS at the moment, no Linux OS is available.
- **No Refund** is available on this offer. If you want to test our service, please order with our regular pricing to be eligible for our 7-days money back guarantee.

##Features:
- All price already had both Windows 2012 R2 and 2016 License **included**.
- **Hyper-V** based virtualization: boost performance of your Windows VPS by 20-30% compared with KVM.
- 4 Locations: **California, US**, **Texas, US**, **Virginia, US**, **London, UK**
- Powered by enterprise NVMe (ReFS + RAID 1) in CA,VA. SSDs (ReFS + RAID1/10) in TX, UK.
- 60-seconds deployment.
- Accepting Paypal, Cryptocurrency, Perfect money, QIWI, Webmoney, Alipay.

##OFFERS:
**50% OFF RECURRING** on HYONIX-2GB package. COUPON: **2GBBF2019** (Quantity: 20).


<pre>
1 Unlimited vCore
2 GB RAM
25 GB SSD (or NVMe depends on location).
Unmetered Bandwidth @ 1 Gbps
1 Dedicated IP
Licensed Windows 2012 - 2016
</pre>
**Monthly:** $3.25
**Quarterly:** $9.25 ($3.083/m)
**Annually:** $32.5 ($2.7083/m) - Free Double Storage, please open a ticket to be upgraded!
**Order link:**  https://my.hyonix.com/register.php

##Test IP:
- London, UK (Zare): 89.34.96.126
- California, US (Quadranet): 185.244.38.254
- Texas, US (Hivelocity): 45.34.12.147
- Virginia, US (AtlanticMetro): 45.133.118.37

##More:
- About us: https://hyonix.com/about-us
- Terms of services: https://hyonix.com/tos
- Acceptable Usage Policy (AUP): https://hyonix.com/aup
- Privacy Policy: https://hyonix.com/privacy

Feel free to ask us any question via LET PMs, Live Chat, [Ticket](https://my.hyonix.com/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2)
